showTracker.Name: Show Tracker
showTracker.Hint: Enable this to display the default combat tracker

limitPhases.Name: Limit Phases
limitPhases.Hint: After the three phases are finished, move on to the next round of combat.

startupTutorial.Name: Play Startup Tutorial
startupTutorial.Hint: Disable this if you don't want the tutorial to play each time the page loads

phaseOne.Name: First Phase
phaseOne.Hint: Set a custom name for the first phase

phaseTwo.Name: Second Phase
phaseTwo.Hint: Set a custom name for the second phase

phaseThree.Name: Third Phase
phaseThree.Hint: Set a custom name for the third phase
